scenarios.hook: POV: College applications while managing family care is graduate-level stress

chaos_moments.text: College costs vs. care costs vs. reality
Dream school across country vs. staying close for family
Help with essays while managing medical appointments
Campus tours require care coordination for parents
Prepare for kid leaving while family needs increase

scenarios.inner_monologue: College planning wasn't this complicated for previous generations.

scenarios.hook: POV: Open enrollment becomes advanced probability mathematics

chaos_moments.text: Compare coverage for three different medical profiles
Ensure all current providers covered under new plan
Check formularies for expensive medications
Premium vs. deductible vs. out-of-pocket maximums
Make perfect decision with imperfect information quickly

scenarios.inner_monologue: Healthcare decisions shouldn't require MBA in risk management.
scenarios.punchline: Choose plan based on which color brochure is least depressing
